text: Wout Holverda (22 April 1958 – 3 December 2021) was a Dutch football striker who played most of his career for Sparta Rotterdam. In 2010, Holverda was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.Holverda ontroerd door actie supporters Sparta - Rijnmond He died from COVID-19 on 3 December 2021, aged 63.Wout Holverda (63) overleden: ‘Een Sparta-knuffelbeer met de eeuwige glimlach op zijn gezicht’ - AD ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Leiden Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands Category:People with Alzheimer's disease
title: Wout Holverda
